AnnualEmssnInventory.name: AnnualEmssnInventory
AnnualEmssnInventory.description: Represents information about a company's total carbon emissions for a particular year in metric tonnes of CO2e (tCO2e). These emissions are the sum of all the emissions in scope 1, scope 2, and scope 3 greenhouse gas categories.

AccountNameId.description: Name of the company, it's subsidiary, or it's business unit for which you are doing carbon accounting.

AllocScope1And2Emssn.description: The scope 1 and scope 2 emissions allocated to the inventory of an account.

AllocScope1EmissionsInTco2e.description: The scope 1 emissions allocated to the inventory of an account.

AllocScope1EmssnOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the scope 1 emissions that are allocated to the inventory of an account.

AllocScope2EmssnInTco2e.description: The scope 2 emissions allocated to the inventory of an account.

AllocScope2EmssnOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the scope 2 emissions that are allocated to the inventory of an account.

AllocScope2LocBasedEmssn.description: The scope 2 location-based emissions allocated to the inventory of an account.

AllocScope2MktBasedEmssn.description: The scope 2 market-based emissions allocated to the inventory of an account.

AllocScope3EmssnInTco2e.description: The scope 3 emissions allocated to the inventory of an account.

AllocScope3EmssnOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the scope 3 emissions that are allocated to the inventory of an account.

EmissionsAllocToFranchCatg.description: The emissions from child or partner companies that are allocated to GHG category 14 - Franchises category of the parent company account.

EmissionsAllocToInvestCatg.description: The emissions from child or partner companies that are allocated to GHG Category 15 - Investments category of the parent company account.

EnergyUsageCmclBldOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the energy used in commercial buildings.

EnergyUsageCommercialBld.description: The energy used in all the commercial buildings that are related to the carbon footprint record or the override value.

EnergyUsageDataCenters.description: The energy used in all the data centers that are related to the carbon footprint record or the override value.

EnergyUsageDataCtrOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the energy used in data centers.

FinalEmssnInTco2e.description: The consolidated emissions of an account that includes allocated emissions of the related account, which could be a child or partner account.

FinalScope1EmssnInTco2e.description: The consolidated scope 1 emissions of an account that includes allocated scope 1 emissions of the related account, which could be a child or partner account.

FinalScope2EmssnInTco2e.description: The consolidated scope 2 emissions of an account that includes allocated scope 2 emissions of the related account, which could be a child or partner account.

FinalScope3EmssnInTco2e.description: The consolidated scope 3 emissions of an account that includes allocated scope 3 emissions of the related account, which could be a child or partner account.

FnlScp1And2EmssnInTco2e.description: The consolidated scope 1 and scope 2 emissions of an account that includes allocated scope 1 and scope 2 emissions of the related account, which could be a child or a partner account.

IsLocked.description: Indicates if the record is locked or not.

IsRecordLocked.description: Indicates that the annual emissions inventory record and the associated carbon footprint records are locked for editing.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MayEdit.description: Indicates if the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

RenewableEnergyUsagePctCmclBld.description: The percentage of renewable energy used for the total electricity consumption of all the commercial buildings that are related to the carbon footprint record or the override value.

RenewableEnergyUsagePctDataCtr.description: The percentage of total renewable energy used for the total electricity consumption of all the data centers that are related to the carbon footprint record or the override value.

RenewableEnrgyPctCmclBldOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the commercial buildings renewable energy percentage.

RenewableEnrgyPctDataCtrOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the data centers renewable energy percentage.

Scope1EmissionsDataCenters.description: The scope 1 emissions from data centers that’s calculated based on the data center emissions in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope1EmissionsFleetVehicles.description: The scope 1 emissions from fleet vehicles that’s calculated based on the fleet vehicle emissions in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope1EmissionsPrivateJets.description: The scope 1 emissions from private jets that’s calculated based on the private jet emissions in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope1EmssnCmclBldOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the scope 1 emissions from commercial buildings.

Scope1EmssnCommercialBuildings.description: The scope 1 emissions from commercial buildings that’s calculated based on the commercial building emissions in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope1EmssnDataCentersOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the scope 1 emissions from data centers.

Scope1EmssnPrivateJetsOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the scope 1 emissions from private jets.

Scp1EmssnWstGenInTco2e.description: The scope 1 emissions from company's generated waste that’s calculated based on the waste related emissions in the related waste footprint record or the override value.

Scp1EmssnWstGenOvrideInTco2e.description: The value to override the scope 1 emissions from company's generated waste.

Scope2EmissionsFleetVehicles.description: The scope 2 emissions from fleet vehicles that’s calculated based on the fleet vehicle emissions in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope2EmissionsPrivateJets.description: The scope 2 emissions from private jets that’s calculated based on the private jets emissions in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope2EmissionsType.description: Specifies the type of scope 2 emissions.

Scope2LocBasedEmssnCmclBld.description: The scope 2 emissions from commercial buildings that’s calculated based on the location-based commercial buildings emissions in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope2LocBasedEmssnDataCtr.description: The scope 2 emissions from data centers that’s calculated based on the location-based data center emissions in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope2MarketBasedEmssnCmclBld.description: The scope 2 emissions from commercial buildings that’s calculated based on the market-based commercial building emissions in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope2MarketBasedEmssnDataCtr.description: The scope 2 emissions from data centers that’s calculated based on the market-based data center emissions in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope3EmissionsBusinessTravel.description: The total scope 3 emissions from business travel that is included in category 6 of the related carbon footprint record or the override values.

Scope3EmissionsCapitalGoods.description: The total scope 3 emissions from the production of capital goods that is included in category 2 of the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope3EmissionsDataCenters.description: The total scope 3 emissions from all the data centers in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope3EmissionsFleetVehicles.description: The total scope 3 emissions from all the fleet vehicles in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope3EmissionsFranchises.description: The total scope 3 emissions from the operation of franchises that is included in category 14 of the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope3EmissionsInvestments.description: The total scope 3 emissions from investment that is included in category 15 of the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope3EmissionsPctCapitalGoods.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from the production of capital goods out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scope3EmissionsPctFranchises.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from the operation of franchises out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scope3EmissionsPctInvestments.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from investments out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scope3EmissionsPercentage.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions out of the total emissions.

Scope3EmissionsPrivateJets.description: The total scope 3 emissions from all the private jets in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope3EmissionsWasteGenInOper.description: The total scope 3 emissions from the treatment and disposal of generated waste that is included in category 5 of the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope3EmssnCapitalGoodsOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from the production of capital goods.

Scope3EmssnCmclBldOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from commercial buildings.

Scope3EmssnCommercialBuildings.description: The total scope 3 emissions from all the commercial buildings in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope3EmssnDataCentersOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from data centers.

Scope3EmssnEmpCommutingOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from the transportation of employees.

Scope3EmssnEmployeeCommuting.description: The total scope 3 emissions from the transportation of employees that is included in category 7 of the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope3EmssnFranchisesOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from the operation of franchises.

Scope3EmssnInvestmentsOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from investments.

Scope3EmssnPctBusinessTravel.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from business travel out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scope3EmssnPctDnstrmTrnspDstr.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from the transportation and distribution of downstream leased assets out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scope3EmssnPctEmpCommuting.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from the transportation of employees out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scope3EmssnPctUpstrmLeasedAsst.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from the operation of upstream leased assets out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scope3EmssnPctUseOfSoldPrdct.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from uncategorized sources out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scope3EmssnUseOfSoldProducts.description: The total scope 3 emissions from the use of sold products and services that is included in category 11 of the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scope3UncategorizedEmissions.description: The total scope 3 emissions from uncategorized sources in the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scp1EmssnFleetVehiclesOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the scope 1 emissions from fleet vehicles.

Scp2EmssnFleetVehiclesOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the scope 2 emissions from fleet vehicles.

Scp2EmssnPrivateJetsOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the scope 2 emissions from private jets.

Scp2LocBsdEmssnCmclBldOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the scope 2 location-based emissions from commercial buildings.

Scp2LocBsdEmssnDataCtrOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the scope 2 location-based emissions from data centers.

Scp2MktBsdEmssnCmclBldOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the scope 2 market-based emissions from commercial buildings.

Scp2MktBsdEmssnDataCtrOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the scope 2 market-based emissions from data centers.

Scp3EmssnBusinessTravelOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from business travel.

Scp3EmssnDnstrmLeasedAssets.description: The total scope 3 emissions from downstream leased assets that is included in category 13 of the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scp3EmssnDnstrmLeasedAstOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from downstream leased assets.

Scp3EmssnDnstrmTrnspDstrOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from the transportation and distribution of downstream assets.

Scp3EmssnDownstreamTrnspDstr.description: The total scope 3 emissions from the transportation and distribution of downstream assets that is included in category 9 of the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scp3EmssnEolSoldPrdctOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from the end-of-life treatment of sold products.

Scp3EmssnEolTreatOfSoldPrdct.description: The total scope 3 emissions from the end-of-life treatment of sold products that is included in category 12 of the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scp3EmssnFleetVehiclesOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from fleet vehicles.

Scp3EmssnFuelEnergyActivity.description: The total scope 3 emissions from the production of fuel and energy that is included in category 3 of the related carbon footprint record or the override values.

Scp3EmssnFuelEnrgyActvtyOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from the production of fuel and energy.

Scp3EmssnPctDnstrmLeasedAssets.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from the downstream leased assets out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scp3EmssnPctEolTreatSoldPrdct.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from the end-of-life treatment of sold products out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scp3EmssnPctFuelEnrgyActivity.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from the production of fuel and energy out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scp3EmssnPctProcSoldProducts.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from the processing of sold products out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scp3EmssnPctPurchGoodsAndSrvcs.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from the production of purchased goods and services out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scp3EmssnPctUpstrmTrnspDstr.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from the transportation and distribution of upstream leased assets out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scp3EmssnPctWasteGenInOper.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from the treatment and disposal of generated waste out of the total scope 3 emissions.

Scp3EmssnPrivateJetsOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from private jets.

Scp3EmssnProcSoldPrdctOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from the processing of sold products.

Scp3EmssnProcSoldProducts.description: The total scope 3 emissions from the processing of sold products that is included in category 10 of the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scp3EmssnPurchGoodsAndServices.description: The scope 3 emissions from the production of purchased goods and services, included in category 1 associated with the carbon footprint record or the relevant override value.

Scp3EmssnPurchGoodsSrvcsOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from the production of purchased goods and services.

Scp3EmssnUpstreamLeasedAssets.description: The total scope 3 emissions from the operation of upstream leased assets that is included in category 8 of the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scp3EmssnUpstreamTrnspDstr.description: The total scope 3 emissions from the transportation and distribution of upstream leased assets that is included in category 4 of the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

Scp3EmssnUpstrmLeasedAstOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from the operation of upstream leased assets.

Scp3EmssnUpstrmTrnspDstrOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from the transportation and distribution of upstream leased assets.

Scp3EmssnUseOfSoldPrdctOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from the use of sold products and services.

Scp3EmssnWasteGenInOperOvride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from the treatment and disposal of generated waste.

Scp3UncategorizedEmssnOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions from uncategorized sources.

Scp3UncatgEmssnPct.description: The percentage of scope 3 emissions from uncategorized sources out of the total scope 3 emissions.

SupplementalScope3EmissionsPct.description: The percentage of supplemental scope 3 emissions out of the total scope 3 emissions.

TotScope2LocBasedEmssn.description: The total scope 2 location-based emissions from all the related records or the override value.

TotScope2MarketBsdEmssn.description: The total scope 2 market-based emissions from all the related records or the override value.

TotalAllocEmissionsInTco2e.description: The total emissions allocated to the inventory of an account.

TotalScope1And2Emissions.description: The total scope 1 and 2 emissions of the related carbon footprint record.

TotalScope1Emissions.description: The total scope 1 emissions from all the related energy use records and the supplemental emissions from the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

TotalScope1EmissionsOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 1 emissions.

TotalScope2Emissions.description: The total scope 2 emissions from all the related energy use records and the supplemental emissions from the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

TotalScope2EmissionsOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 2 emissions.

TotalScope3Emissions.description: The total scope 3 emissions of the related carbon footprint record that’s calculated based on categorized, uncategorized, and supplemental scope 3 emissions or the override value.

TotalScope3EmissionsOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total scope 3 emissions.

TotalSuplScope3EmssnOverride.description: The emissions value entered to override the value of the total supplemental scope 3 emissions.

TotalSuplScp3Emissions.description: The total supplemental scope 3 emissions from the related carbon footprint record or the override value.

UniqueIdx.description: The unique index for this record. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

Year.description: The year to which the carbon emissions inventory data corresponds.
